description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the information disclosure vulnerability in Windows Graphics Components for CVE-2024-43534:

1. Download and apply the recommended KB updates pertinent to your system version from the official Windows Update catalog.
2. **Restart your system** after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities that could potentially lead to information disclosure.
- For the most relevant updates, visit the links below for further details on how to manually install the updates:
  - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
  - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a supported version as listed in the build numbers.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
